entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023
